entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8 except 13 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 8 except 13 inland. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 10.
